```{r}
#| label: load-pkg-data
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(httr)
install.packages("httr")

api_url <- "https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/p937-wjvj.csv"
response <- GET(api_url)
rats <- read.csv(text = content(response, "text"))
```

head(rats)
